name: Soldier Clicker
description:
This is soldier clicker. This is where you click and get an ending. You can also call it a speedrunning game if you want. I participated in brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. and how does it fit the theme? you get soldiers to war and be stronger together. I hope you guys enjoyed this game. I might also upload a video to my coders JE channel so if u wanna check that out go to my home page and see my coders channel.

btw if this will be a speedrunning game. tell the one whois trying to speedrun this that you can start if you click the button and ends if you get an ending. there 3 endings to this game. and go read the ReadMe file for a guide to the game.

oh and backround music by louis gaming. this is the backround music
